head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SLOAN, DR. HAROLD J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SLOAN, DR. HAROLD J.

block.p: SLOAN-Dr. Harold J. Orthodontist in Brooklyn and Babylon for 50 years. Beloved husband of Sydell. Devoted father of Walter and Gary and stepfather of Leslie and Jonathan. Cherished grandfather of Ari, Brandon, Jared, Eric, Emily, Jacob, Jordan and Samantha. Loving brother of Morton and Adele. Service Thursday, 11AM at Riverside Nassau North Chapels, 55 North Station Plaza, Great Neck, New York.
